title: Hour 1: Excellence Over Humanity
description:
The show addresses three off-the-court stories in the NBA including Josh Primo, Ime Udoka, and Kyrie Irving. We discuss where the NBA dropped the ball on Kyrie's lack of punishment and why the Nets could believe Ime Udoka will be okay in their workplace despite his issues in Boston. Plus, Mike Schur joins us for a World Series Stat of the Day, his thoughts on Udoka, and why the Republican response to the attack of Paul Pelosi signals the death of reasonable discourse in America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Plus, Mike Schur joins us for a World Series Stat of the Day, his thoughts on Udoka, and why the Republican response to the attack of Paul Pelosi signals the death of reasonable discourse in America.
